## WELCOME!
**Hello and Welcome to Cedar Ridge Christian Church!**
My name is Greg Pittman and I'm the pastor at Cedar Ridge Christian Church and I'm so glad you've taken the time to find out a little bit more about us.  If you were to come to our house we'd count you as family.  In fact, that's my favorite description of the church it's family it's about relationships, it's about building community, and when you come to Cedar Ridge your family. Our mission is simple.  That's helping others follow Jesus. We're a multi-site Church with campuses in Broken Arrow and Coweta; allowing us to be a Community Church while at the same time making a global impact.

## WHAT ARE YOUR SERVICES LIKE?
We like to call our worship services multigenerational. We want to worship and exalt Jesus in an environment that is open to everyone. We sing songs, pray together, and hear God's word from Pastor Greg Pitman. Our services also feature creative elements to help tell God's story as we work to reach Coweta, BA & Beyond. Join us at 9:00 AM & 10:30 AM for worship.
We also have small group classes that meet at 9:00 AM and 10:30 AM.

## WHAT ABOUT MY KIDS?
Glad you asked! We are absolutely committed to raising up the next generation of Christ followers and Christian leaders. We have some of the most amazing and dynamic activities you will find, so we have the friends and fun well covered. But we are also very intentional and strategic. We want to walk with you as you guide your children towards a lifetime of Christ-like living.

We have kids programming for preschoolers through fifth grade on Sundays at 8:00 AM, 9:30 AM, and 11:00 AM. Students meet on Sundays at 9:30 AM in our Student Center.
[Learn More About Kids Ministry](/kids){: .btn} [Learn More About Student Ministry](/student){: .btn .tertiary} [Learn More About Community Preschool](/preschool){: .btn .secondary}

## OTHER QUESTIONS?
You can find more information by exploring our website. If you prefer, feel free to give us a call at 918-555-5555 or [send us a message here](/contact). We would love to hear from you and we hope you have a great experience in the Lord at Cedar Ridge Christian Church.
